location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 6: James Dow, Assistant Surgeon, Temporarily in Charge of the Residency, Bushire, to Francis Warden, Chief Secretary to the Government, Bombay

mods.abstract: In this letter James Dow, Assistant Surgeon, temporarily in charge of the Residency, acknowledges the receipt of Francis Warden's letter of 11 May, which included an account of eighteen cases of glassware intended for His Majesty the Shah of Persia [Fat'h Ali Shah Qajar], together with a bill of lading for the aforementioned packages.
